The People' s Republic of Bangladesh
In Bangladesh, which is largely inhabited by Hindus, people are regarded as the "lambs" because they share the common belief that their ancestors lived at the height of Brahmanism and Hindu philosophy (mysticism). In accordance to the "Brahman Character", most are Brahmans (the Brahmans are the people who are the main ancestors of the human race). However, there are also people who are the "mild brethren".
